short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve the inline css visualization inside webflow input field.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Your Webflow Experience with Webflow Input Enhancer!

Streamline your workflow with Webflow Input Enhancer! This extension improves how style tag values appear in Webflow’s input fields. Working with multiple CSS properties can be tedious, but this tool simplifies the process by breaking each property into individual lines for easier navigation and editing. Once you’re done, it seamlessly reformats everything back for you.
How It Works:

• Install the extension.
• Insert the word [Style] to the property name to enhance the input field to work with inline css.
• Insert the word [Class] to the property name to enhance the input to work with classes.
• Insert the word [Dropdown="ID"] to enhance the input to display dropdown options to that specific field. Watch our tutorial video to understand more about it.
• Click to edit, and the extension will automatically detect the input field and enhance it for better visualization and editing.

Make CSS editing in Webflow properties effortless and more efficient with Webflow Input Enhancer!
